title: Person of Interest - Death Of Major Characters
author: KCBNAPS
comment: The worst one for me was Carter - I did not see that one coming.  I loved that character.
The wasted in the middle of the screen ruins

Elias: "I'm not going to kill you."  "I'm just going to watch!"

PS, You really should've left off the 'WASTED'
officer simmons was my favorite, it was the episode that reminded me why elias was my favorite criminal
description:
I do not own the rights to the Person Of Interest footage.

WARNING - These clips may contain spoilers if you haven't seen all the episodes from seasons 1 to 3.

This video contains all the final scenes of the major characters or characters that had multiple appearances before they were killed off the Person Of Interest Series from seasons 1-3.
